name: MTLRenderPassColorAttachmentDescriptor
desc: A color render target that serves as the output destination for color pixels generated by a render pass.

items.name: var clearColor: MTLClearColor
items.desc: The color to use when clearing the color attachment.

items.name: struct MTLClearColor
items.desc: An RGBA value used for a color pixel.

items.name: func MTLClearColorMake(Double, Double, Double, Double) -> MTLClearColor
items.desc: Returns a color value used to clear a color attachment.
